Introduction

Li Quanzhe, also known as Lee Kwon Cheol, is a Chinese Idol singer under Yuehua Entertainment.
He made his solo debut in 2016, and made his debut as a member of the boy group NEX7 on June 21, 2018 with the album 'The First I'.

In January of 2018. he participated on IQiYi's Idol Survival Show 'Idol Producer' but was eliminated, ranking 23rd.
